Title: Google Revisits JPEG XL in Chromium After Earlier Removal
Description:

Title: Silicon Valley startups: being evil, again and again
Description:

But in reality its culture is deeply unethical since it institutionalises theft on a global scale.

Title: Nearby super-Earth emerges as a top target in the search for life
Description:
Researchers have pinpointed a super-Earth in the habitable zone of a nearby M-dwarf star only 18 light-years away.
Sophisticated instruments detected the planet’s gentle tug on its star, hinting at a rocky world that could hold liquid water.

Title: Scholars say most of what we believe about Vikings is wrong
Description:
Ideas about Vikings and Norse mythology come mostly from much later medieval sources, leaving plenty of room for reinterpretation.
